```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(writexl)
library(stringr)
library(rstanarm)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
mls_data <- read.csv("mls-salaries-2007.csv")

```

```{r}
x <- mls_data |> 
  select("club", "position", "base_salary")
```

```{r}
fit_1 <- stan_glm(base_salary ~ position,
                  data = x,
                  family = gaussian,
                  refresh = 0)
fit_1
```
